name: Pavel Durov privacy keeper
description: Explore the Pavel Durov NFT Collection: A Unique Blend of Utility, Fun, and Privacy Advocacy | Welcome to a playful and engaging NFT series inspired by Pavel Durov, the founder of Telegram. Each piece in this collection captures Durovâ€™s innovative spirit through creative and fun animations, as well as his relentless fight for user privacy. this collection stands out with a strong message of privacy protection, presenting Pavel Durov as a hero fighting the world for the virtue of privacy. Each NFT is not just a medium for fun and perks but also a symbol of resistance against privacy infringement.
